title: Did Bilal have pronunciation issues so sahaba asked him not to give adhan & Sun didn't rise? #assim
transcript: Al how can I help you Muhammad I would like to confirm a story that there was a time where B had some pronunciation problems and some of the sahab told him that someone else should call the fan and then at that day the sun has not risen and it remained dark and Propet and the prophet peace be upon Him replied that Allah has held back the son as did not give the fan is this authentic no of course not this is not authentic at all and it's not befitting of the sunah and of the and of B may Allah be pleased with him to be involved in such Bollywood type stories no this is totally unreal and not true and Allah knows best no sh
